HomePage.readAgreement: I have read and agree to

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Please read and check the box before confirming.

reminder.tips1: 1. Please make sure the ticket information is correct.
reminder.tips2: 2. Online ticket booking for shuttle buses closes at 8:00 PM the day before.
reminder.tips3: 3. The estimated travel time from Kinmen Pier to the airport is 15-20 minutes. To avoid affecting your trip, ensure there is at least a 90-minute interval between flight arrival and departure times. Plan your trip carefully and allow enough time for check-in, baggage drop-off, and security procedures. Any inconvenience or loss caused by insufficient time will be borne by the passenger.
reminder.tips4: 4. Online ticket refunds are available up to 90 minutes before the departure time.
reminder.tips5: 5. Tickets are valid only on the day of the trip. Unused tickets will be automatically refunded to the original payment channel within 3-5 business days.
